oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Naphthoquinone-based chalcone hybrids and derivatives: synthesis and potent activity against cancer cell lines
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JARDIM, GAM
GUIMARAES, TT
PINTO, MDFR

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: LAPACHONE-BASED 1,2,3-TRIAZOLES
NOR-ALPHA-LAPACHONE
BETA-LAPACHONE
HETEROCYCLIC-DERIVATIVES
ANTIMALARIAL ACTIVITY
ANTITUMOR-ACTIVITY
TRYPANOSOMA-CRUZI
CYTOTOXICITY
AGENTS
INHIBITORS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Novel naphthoquinone-based chalcones were prepared from the reaction between 3-bromo-nor-beta-lapachone and amino-chalcones. Lapachone derivatives are also described here. All the substances were evaluated against cancer and normal cell lines and several compounds demonstrated potent antitumor activity.
